amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-200 to codify sections of the Code of Federal Regulations related to oil and gas wells, drilling, and operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crist amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Crist.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crist amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
